text: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānassati evaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā
edit: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave ānāpānassati evaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā

translations.transtext: In that way, monks, mindfulness of breathing [was] cultivated; in that way [it], having been practiced frequently, is rich in result, rich in benefit?
